hub.title: About BISO
hub.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our student union
hub.description: Explore our purpose, policies, bylaws, history, and how we work to improve study quality. You’ll also find information about our national Operations Unit, Alumni initiative, our support for SAIH, and our Varsling (whistleblowing) channel.

whatIsBiso.title: What is BISO
whatIsBiso.description: Who we are, what we do, and how we support students across all campuses.

politics.title: Our politics
politics.description: We are politically independent, engaged in student politics to improve student life.

bylaws.title: Bylaws and statutes
bylaws.description: National statutes and local bylaws for each campus.

history.title: Our history
history.description: A brief history of BISO and key milestones.

studyQuality.title: Study quality
studyQuality.description: How we work to improve teaching, learning, and student experience at BI.

operations.title: Operations Unit
operations.description: Our national department responsible for organizational operations.

alumni.title: Alumni
alumni.description: About the BISO Alumni network and how to get involved.

saih.title: Support SAIH
saih.description: Learn why we support SAIH and how you can contribute.

varsling.title: Varsling (Whistleblowing)
varsling.description: Report incidents safely. Read our code of conduct and how to submit.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.subtitle: We actively work towards our strategic goals

impact.title: Impact
impact.desc: Give students a voice at BI, in student politics and in society.

connected.title: Connected
connected.desc: Unite students across campuses and connect them with industry.

engaged.title: Engaged
engaged.desc: An inclusive, social and rewarding environment enriching the BI experience.

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.subtitle: What BISO does at every campus
whatWeDo.lead: All funds in BISO go back to student welfare. We create events, and committees have budgets to organize social and academic activities for students!

academics.title: Academics
academics.subtitle: Your voice in academia
academics.lead: BISO represents students’ academic interests and works to increase the focus on sustainability. We do this through forums with BI and in dialogue with students.
items: Advocate for more focus on sustainability

politics.title: Our politics
politics.lead: Student politics is about creating student welfare. We fight for student issues.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Find contact information at the bottom of the campus page

au.title: Contact the Executive Board (Arbeidsutvalget)
au.desc: The Executive Board consists of full-time student officers. They work strategically and facilitate campus leaderships to deliver student activities and benefits for our BISO members.

whatIsBiso.title: What is BISO
whatIsBiso.intro: BISO is the student union at BI Norwegian Business School, representing and empowering students across campuses.
whatIsBiso.content: We create opportunities for students through events, academic initiatives, and community building, collaborating with BI and external partners to improve the student experience.

politics.title: Our politics
politics.content: We engage in student politics to advocate for quality education, inclusion, and student welfare. Our focus is constructive dialogue with BI and national student bodies.

bylaws.title: Bylaws and statutes
bylaws.intro: Governance documents that define our structure, roles, and processes.
bylaws.content: Here you will find national statutes applicable to all campuses and links to local bylaws. These documents ensure transparency, accountability, and consistent operations.

history.title: Our history
history.intro: Where we come from and how we grew.
history.content: From local student initiatives to a national union, BISO’s story is shaped by volunteers committed to improving student life at BI.

studyQuality.title: Study quality
studyQuality.intro: Continuous improvement of education and learning environment.
studyQuality.content: We collect student feedback, collaborate with faculty, and run initiatives that strengthen academic quality and wellbeing across campuses.

operations.title: Operations Unit
operations.intro: Our national department for organizational excellence.
operations.content: The Operations Unit supports campuses with governance, finance, compliance, and shared services to ensure sustainable and efficient operations.

alumni.title: BISO Alumni
alumni.intro: A growing network for former BISO students and volunteers.
alumni.content: Learn about the vision for BISO Alumni and how you can participate. To join or explore programs, visit the Alumni site.

saih.title: Support SAIH
saih.intro: SAIH promotes academic freedom and education rights globally.
saih.content: BISO supports SAIH’s mission. Learn how we collaborate and how you can support through donations, awareness, and events.
